summary: CHRYSLER RECALLS P14 & P36 HAVE BEEN IN EFFECT SINCE MAY AND AUGUST OF THIS YEAR RESPECTFULLY. TO DATE I AM UNABLE TO OBTAIN PARTS FOR EITHER RECALL FROM CHRYSLER.  P14 DEALS WITH ERODING BOOSTER PUMP ENCLOSURES AND THEY CONTINUALLY TELL ME THEY CANNOT GET PARTS. 7 MONTHS HAS ELAPSED SINCE NOTIFICATION AND NO REMEDY IN SITE.  *TR
